entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:07 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
